scripts.devb: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_TOOL=vite run-p clear dev:*
scripts.devall: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_TOOL=vite CS_BUILD=true run-p clear dev:* cs:dev
scripts.devall2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_TOOL=vite CS_BUILD=true run-p clear dev:* csDevAll
scripts.devallweb: cross-env NODE_ENV=development CS_BUILD=true run-p clear dev:* csDevWebpack
scripts.dev:chrome: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json" cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome webpack --config build-tools/webpack-config/webpack.config.test.ts --watch
scripts.dev:firefox: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json" cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox webpack --config build-tools/webpack-config/webpack.config.ts --watch
scripts.dev:opera: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json" cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=opera webpack --config build-tools/webpack-config/webpack.config.ts --watch
scripts.build:chrome: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json" cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome webpack --config build-tools/webpack-config/webpack.config.test.ts && npm run write:manifest
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json" cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox  webpack --config build-tools/webpack-config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:opera: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json" cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=opera webpack --config build-tools/webpack-config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.webpack:build: yarn run build:chrome && yarn run build:firefox && yarn run build:opera
scripts.chromedev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn run write:manifest && yarn run dev:chrome
